```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(forecast)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
wine=ts(read_csv('/Users/APinkerton/NYC_DS_A/toy_dataset_work/wine.csv'),frequency=12)
wine=wine[,2]
autoplot(wine)

arim<-auto.arima(wine)
fc=forecast(arim,h = 12)
autoplot(fc)
```
